title: Casting Off
description: Librarian note: alternate covers for this edition can be found here and here.The aftermath of war, and the slow dawning of a new era of freedom and opportunity, shape the destinies of the Cazalets in the final volume of this magnificent family saga. Polly, Clary and Louise, now grown up, are ready to discover the truth about the adult world. While Rupert, Hugh and Edward must make the choices that will decide their own - and the family`s - future.For the Cazalets, and all those close to them, one end is another beginning...
author: Elizabeth Jane Howard
